column4: Continental joins BMW  Intel  Mobileye platform for self-driving cars
column5: BERLIN  June 20 Continental said on Tuesday it would join a self-driving platform developed by BMW   Intel and Mobileye with the German auto parts and tyre maker handling integration of components and software.

column4: Apple tells court Qualcomm chip licenses are invalid
column5: Apple Inc broadened a legal attack on Qualcomm Inc  arguing to a U.S. federal court that license agreements that secure the chip maker a cut of every iPhone manufactured were invalid.

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm makes strategic investment in Amionx
column5: * Qualcomm Inc - as part of its investment  Qualcomm president Derek Aberle will join board of directors of Amionx Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
